alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pierce, central Brantley and south central Wayne Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Raybon, or near Nahunta, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nahunta, Raybon, Atkinson and Hortense. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
